display_name: Over the past one month, at what time on average has your child gone to bed on weekdays (first closed the eyes in attempt to fall asleep)
description:
Item from Pediatric Sleep Questionnaire. [Chervin et al, 2000 (PubMed ID: 10733617)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/10733617)

[Search for all PSQ variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=psq)
